verses.verse: Concerning the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Has <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons?<s%> has he <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3423>heir?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> then does their <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in his <S%H5892>cities?<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will cause an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H5984>Ammonites;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H8510>heap,<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> then shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H3423>heir<s%> to them that were his <S%H3423>heirs,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> O <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> for <S%H5857>Ai<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> <S%H6817>cry,<s%> you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> <S%H2296>gird<s%> you with <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> <S%H5594>lament,<s%> and <S%H7751>run<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> by the <S%H1448>hedges;<s%> for their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> together.

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H1984>glory<s%> you in the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> your <S%H2100>flowing<s%> <S%H6010>valley,<s%> O <S%H7728>backsliding<s%> <S%H1323>daughter?<s%> that <S%H982>trusted<s%> in her <S%H214>treasures,<s%> saying, <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to me?

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H6343>fear<s%> on you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> those that be <S%H5439>about<s%> you; and you shall be <S%H5080>driven<s%> out every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>right<s%> <S%H6440>forth;<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> up him that <S%H5074>wanders.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Concerning <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> Is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in <S%H8487>Teman?<s%> is <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H6>perished<s%> from the <S%H995>prudent?<s%> is their <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5628>vanished?<s%>

<S%H5127>Flee<s%> you, <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H6437>back,<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan;<s%> for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> on him, the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> him.

<S%H518>If<s%> grape <S%H1219>gatherers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to you, would they not <S%H7604>leave<s%> some <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> grapes? <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1590>thieves<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> they will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> till they have <S%H1767>enough.<s%>

But I have made <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H2834>bore,<s%> I have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H4565>secret<s%> places, and he shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> himself: his <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and his <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> and he is not.
<S%H5800>Leave<s%> your <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> children, I will <S%H2421>preserve<s%> them <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and let your <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in me.

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> was not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> have <S%H8354>assuredly<s%> <S%H7937>drunken;<s%> and are you he that shall altogether go <S%H5352>unpunished?<s%> you shall not go <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> but you shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of it.

For I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by myself, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> a <S%H2721>waste,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof shall be <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>wastes.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8052>rumor<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> saying, <S%H6908>Gather<s%> you together, and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her, and <S%H6965>rise<s%> up to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H959>despised<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

Your <S%H8606>terribleness<s%> has <S%H5377>deceived<s%> you, and the <S%H2087>pride<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O you that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> that <S%H8610>hold<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill:<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> you should make your <S%H7064>nest<s%> as <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> I will <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Also <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H8047>desolation:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>goes<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> thereof.

As in the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up like a <S%H738>lion<s%> from the <S%H1347>swelling<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H386>strong:<s%> but I will <S%H7280>suddenly<s%> make him <S%H7323>run<s%> away from her: and <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H970>chosen<s%> man, that I may <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> her? for <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> me? and <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H3259>appoint<s%> me the time? and <S%H4310>who<s%> is that <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> that will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me?

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he has <S%H3289>taken<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H123>Edom;<s%> and his <S%H4284>purposes,<s%> that he has <S%H2803>purposed<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8487>Teman:<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall <S%H5498>draw<s%> them out: <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> he shall make their <S%H5116>habitations<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> with them.

The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7493>moved<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of their <S%H5307>fall,<s%> at the <S%H6818>cry<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> thereof was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up and <S%H1675>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H1224>Bozrah:<s%> and at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H123>Edom<s%> be as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs.<s%>

Concerning <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> is <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and <S%H774>Arpad:<s%> for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>tidings:<s%> they are <S%H4127>fainthearted;<s%> there is <S%H1674>sorrow<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> be <S%H8252>quiet.<s%>

<S%H1834>Damascus<s%> is waxed <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and <S%H6437>turns<s%> herself to <S%H5127>flee,<s%> and <S%H7374>fear<s%> has <S%H2388>seized<s%> on her: <S%H6869>anguish<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> her, as a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>
<S%H349>How<s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> not <S%H5800>left,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> of my <S%H4885>joy!<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> her <S%H970>young<s%> men shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall be <S%H1826>cut<s%> off in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
And I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1130>Benhadad.<s%>

Concerning <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and concerning the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> you, <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H7703>spoil<s%> the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Their <S%H168>tents<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> away: they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> to <S%H1992>themselves<s%> their <S%H3407>curtains,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> to them, <S%H4032>Fear<s%> is on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side.<s%>

<S%H5127>Flee,<s%> <S%H5110>get<s%> you <S%H3966>far<s%> off, <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6009>deep,<s%> O you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has taken <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and has <S%H2803>conceived<s%> a <S%H4284>purpose<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H5927>get<s%> you up to the <S%H7961>wealthy<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> without <S%H983>care,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1817>gates<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1280>bars,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H909>alone.<s%>

And their <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall be a <S%H957>booty,<s%> and the <S%H527>multitude<s%> of their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil:<s%> and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> them that are in the <S%H7112>utmost<s%> <S%H6285>corners;<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H343>calamity<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5676>sides<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> shall be a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> for <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in it.

The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H5867>Elam<s%> in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H1369>might.<s%>

And on <S%H5867>Elam<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>quarters<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them toward <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H7307>winds;<s%> and there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%> shall not <S%H935>come.<s%>

For I will cause <S%H5867>Elam<s%> to be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on them, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H5704>till<s%> I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them:

And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and will <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
